data.title: American Film Market
data.meta_description: Bringing Film To Life.The Entire Global Catalogue. Films and projects from around the world – in all stages of development and production – are presented every year at AFM. A Centralized Market. AFM is more business-oriented than any other film market. A Beachfront Campus. Business Matchmaking.
